description: Roof framing plan for second-story ADU above existing garage. Shows rafter layout (2x6 @ 16" O.C.), ridge board (2x6), ceiling joists (2x10 C.J. @ 16" O.C.), PSL beam (3-1/2x9-1/4), roof sheathing specs (1/2" APA Rated EXP-1 32/16), cripple wall sheathing note, and 10 plan notes. Scale 1/4" = 1'-0".
key_content: Typ. roof sheathing: 1/2" APA Rated EXP-1, Sheathing (32/16) — E.N. = 8d @ 6", F.N. = 8d @ 12" (no blocking required at seams)
Roof rafters: 2x6 @ 16" O.C. in multiple bays
Ridge board: 2x6 ridge board running east-west
Ceiling joists: 2x10 C.J. @ 16" O.C.
Engineered beam: 3-1/2x9-1/4 PSL (Parallel Strand Lumber)
4x4 posts at multiple corner and intermediate support locations
4x6 members at corner/intersection points
